mn133:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati tapodārāme.
mn133:3.3: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodo tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
mn133:3.4: Tapode gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
mn133:3.5: Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ tapodaṃ obhāsetvā yenāyasmā samiddhi tenupasaṅkami;
mn133:3.7: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā āyasmantaṃ samiddhiṃ etadavoca: “
mn133:3.8: dhāresi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn133:3.9: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:3.10: Tvaṃ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā”ti?
mn133:3.11: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:3.12: Dhāresi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti?
mn133:3.13: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:3.15: “Ahampi kho, bhikkhu na dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:3.16: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:3.17: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:3.18: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:3.19: Atthasaṃhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
mn133:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā samiddhi tassā rattiyā accayena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn133:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn133:5.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodo tenupasaṅkamiṃ gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
mn133:5.2: Tapode gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsiṃ gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
mn133:5.3: Atha kho bhante, aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ tapodaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn133:5.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā maṃ etadavoca:
mn133:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, taṃ devataṃ etadavocaṃ:
mn133:6.2: ‘na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:6.3: Tvaṃ panāvuso, dhāresi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañcā’ti?
mn133:6.4: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:6.5: Dhāresi pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattiyo gāthā’ti?
mn133:6.6: ‘Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:6.8: ‘Ahampi kho, bhikkhu, na dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthāti.
mn133:6.9: Uggaṇhāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:6.10: pariyāpuṇāhi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca;
mn133:6.11: dhārehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca.
mn133:6.12: Atthasaṃhito, bhikkhu, bhaddekarattassa uddeso ca vibhaṅgo ca ādibrahmacariyako’ti.
mn133:6.15: Sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca desetū”ti.
mn133:6.16: “Tena hi, bhikkhu, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi;
mn133:6.18: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā samiddhi bhagavato paccassosi.
mn133:11.2: idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
mn133:11.3: Atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:11.4: “idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:16.1: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā”ti?
mn133:17.2: “ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ;
mn133:17.3: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
mn133:18.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
mn133:18.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu.
mn133:18.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ mahākaccānaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn133:18.5: “idaṃ kho no, āvuso kaccāna, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:20.1: Tesaṃ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṃ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi—
mn133:20.2: idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:22.1: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyāti?
mn133:22.2: Tesaṃ no, āvuso kaccāna, amhākaṃ etadahosi:
mn133:22.3: ‘ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
mn133:22.4: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
mn133:23.1: “Seyyathāpi, āvuso, puriso sāratthiko sāragavesī sārapariyesanaṃ caramāno mahato rukkhassa tiṭṭhato sāravato atikkammeva mūlaṃ atikkamma khandhaṃ sākhāpalāse sāraṃ pariyesitabbaṃ maññeyya;
mn133:23.2: evaṃsampadamidaṃ āyasmantānaṃ satthari sammukhībhūte taṃ bhagavantaṃ atisitvā amhe etamatthaṃ paṭipucchitabbaṃ maññatha.
mn133:23.3: So hāvuso, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato.
mn133:23.4: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, yathā vo bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn133:24.1: “Addhāvuso kaccāna, bhagavā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passati, cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato.
mn133:24.2: So ceva panetassa kālo ahosi yaṃ bhagavantaṃyeva etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyāma;
mn133:24.3: yathā no bhagavā byākareyya tathā naṃ dhāreyyāma.
mn133:24.4: Api cāyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ;
mn133:24.5: pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṃkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
mn133:25.1: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn133:25.2: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa paccassosuṃ.
mn133:26.1: “Yaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:28.1: Imassa kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi—
mn133:29.2: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti rūpāti—
mn133:29.3: tattha chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atītaṃ anvāgameti.
mn133:29.4: Iti me sotaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti saddāti …
mn133:29.6: iti me ghānaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti gandhāti …
mn133:29.7: iti me jivhā ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti rasāti …
mn133:29.8: iti me kāyo ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:29.9: iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti—
mn133:29.10: tattha chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto atītaṃ anvāgameti—
mn133:30.2: Iti me cakkhu ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti rūpāti—
mn133:30.3: tattha na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atītaṃ nānvāgameti.
mn133:30.4: Iti me sotaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti saddāti …
mn133:30.6: iti me ghānaṃ ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti gandhāti …
mn133:30.7: iti me jivhā ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti rasāti …
mn133:30.8: iti me kāyo ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:30.9: iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti—
mn133:30.10: tattha na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa, na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto atītaṃ nānvāgameti—
mn133:31.2: Iti me cakkhu siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti rūpāti—
mn133:31.3: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati, cetaso paṇidhānapaccayā tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anāgataṃ paṭikaṅkhati.
mn133:31.4: Iti me sotaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti saddāti …
mn133:31.6: iti me ghānaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti gandhāti …
mn133:31.7: iti me jivhā siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti rasāti …
mn133:31.8: iti me kāyo siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:31.9: iti me mano siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti—
mn133:31.10: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ paṇidahati, cetaso paṇidhānapaccayā tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto anāgataṃ paṭikaṅkhati—
mn133:32.2: Iti me cakkhu siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti rūpāti—
mn133:32.3: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ nappaṇidahati, cetaso appaṇidhānapaccayā na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anāgataṃ nappaṭikaṅkhati.
mn133:32.4: Iti me sotaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti saddāti …
mn133:32.6: iti me ghānaṃ siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti gandhāti …
mn133:32.7: iti me jivhā siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti rasāti …
mn133:32.8: iti me kāyo siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti phoṭṭhabbāti …
mn133:32.9: iti me mano siyā anāgatamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti—
mn133:32.10: appaṭiladdhassa paṭilābhāya cittaṃ nappaṇidahati, cetaso appaṇidhānapaccayā na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto anāgataṃ nappaṭikaṅkhati—
mn133:33.4: Tasmiñce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati.
mn133:33.8: yā cāvuso, jivhā ye ca rasā …
mn133:33.9: yo cāvuso, kāyo ye ca phoṭṭhabbā …
mn133:33.10: yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā—
mn133:33.12: Tasmiñce paccuppanne chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa tadabhinandati, tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati—
mn133:33.13: evaṃ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati.
mn133:34.1: Kathañca, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati?
mn133:34.4: Tasmiñce paccuppanne na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati.
mn133:34.8: yā cāvuso, jivhā ye ca rasā …
mn133:34.9: yo cāvuso, kāyo ye ca phoṭṭhabbā …
mn133:34.10: yo cāvuso, mano ye ca dhammā—
mn133:34.12: Tasmiñce paccuppanne na chandarāgappaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ, na chandarāgappaṭibaddhattā viññāṇassa na tadabhinandati, na tadabhinandanto paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati—
mn133:34.13: evaṃ kho, āvuso, paccuppannesu dhammesu na saṃhīrati.
mn133:35.1: Yaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:37.1: Imassa kho ahaṃ, āvuso, bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
mn133:37.2: Ākaṅkhamānā ca pana tumhe āyasmanto bhagavantaṃyeva upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, yathā vo bhagavā byākaroti tathā naṃ dhāreyyāthā”ti.
mn133:38.1: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahākaccānassa bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
mn133:38.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
mn133:38.4: “yaṃ kho no, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:40.1: Tesaṃ no, bhante, amhākaṃ, acirapakkantassa bhagavato, etadahosi:
mn133:40.2: ‘idaṃ kho no, āvuso, bhagavā saṅkhittena uddesaṃ uddisitvā vitthārena atthaṃ avibhajitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ paviṭṭho:
mn133:45.1: Ko nu kho imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajeyyā’ti?
mn133:45.3: ‘ayaṃ kho āyasmā mahākaccāno satthu ceva saṃvaṇṇito sambhāvito ca viññūnaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ.
mn133:45.4: Pahoti cāyasmā mahākaccāno imassa bhagavatā saṅkhittena uddesassa uddiṭṭhassa vitthārena atthaṃ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṃ vibhajituṃ.
mn133:45.7: Atha kho mayaṃ, bhante, yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkamimha;
mn133:45.9: Tesaṃ no, bhante, āyasmatā mahākaccānena imehi ākārehi imehi padehi imehi byañjanehi attho vibhatto”ti.
mn133:46.3: Mañcepi tumhe, bhikkhave, etamatthaṃ paṭipuccheyyātha, ahampi taṃ evamevaṃ byākareyyaṃ yathā taṃ mahākaccānena byākataṃ.
mn133:47.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
